text: Windows Live Messenger is an instant messenger that is the most-used in the world. It is made by the Windows Live section of Microsoft. It used to be called MSN Messenger before MSN was changed into Windows Live. Microsoft announced that they were retiring Windows Live Messenger (except for China) in favor of Skype. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Microsoft Category:Instant messaging software Category:1999 establishments Category:2013 disestablishments
title: Windows Live Messenger
